nodes.text: Morellian Weapons Conglomerate was a weapon manufacturer that created weapons for the Morellian Enforcers during the Old Republic era. Since the company's technology was nowhere near the level of the galactic community, they only produced slugthrowers and projectile weaponry.
An important design from them was the Morellian Weapons Conglomerate .48-caliber Enforcer pistol, which was manufactured in limited quantities for the Enforcers.
